author: techbro_ccoli
content:
If you want to do a further sanity check on the 4844 changes only, you can run the updated 4844 only `execution-spec-tests` in the pyspec sim on this branch: 
https://github.com/spencer-tb/hive/tree/cancun-dn8-4844-only
(geth & nethermind are passing these on my end)
```
./hive --sim ethereum/pyspec --client-file ./configs/cancun.yaml --client <the client>
``` We will post the 4884 & 4788 pyspec sim branch asap
